entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable regions with NativeAOT #65470
    7.0.0
  • GetGCMemoryInfo.TotalAvailableMemoryBytes returns negative value on ARM32 #65466
  • [wasm] Tracking issue for issues caused by the emscripten bump to 2.0.34 #65464
  • Escape analysis inconsistency #65463
  • Consider settings startup environment variables in runtimeConfig.json #65457
  • .NET 5 in Surface Hub devices #65456
  • SslStream tests can hit Assert and fail completely #65455
    7.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.BuildInvalidSignatureTwice failure #65448
  • A heap has been corrupted using PublishSingleFile #65443
  • Enable Mariner 2.0 DEPS package #65441
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Missing implementation for `LocalCertificateSelectionCallback` #65439
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] make emscripten symbols exportable #65436
    7.0.0
  • NamedPipeClientStream sometimes throws FileNotFoundException #65434
  • No access to public Azure feeds? #65430
  • [wasm] Support fetch response streaming on NodeJS #65429
    Future
  • `PublishReadyToRun` with `PublishSingleFile` in linux-arm Blazor Server causes program to crash with "Uncaught Error: No interop methods are registered for renderer 0" #65424
    6.0.x
  • Use createdump to collect crash dumps for libraries tests #65422
  • RevokeEndEntityWithInvalidRevocationName failed #65421
  • The value returned by AsQueryable().FirstOrDefault is different between Net5.0 and Net6.0 #65419
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests.ConstructorTests_Metadata.MultipleThreadsLooping #65418
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexKnownPatternTests.PatternsDataSet_ConstructRegexForAll_NonBacktracking #65417
  • Test failure CoreXml.Test.XLinq.XNodeReaderFunctionalTests.RunTests #65416
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Popcnt\\Popcnt_ro\\Popcnt_ro.cmd #65415
  • Calling Win32 API CreateNamedPipe fails with ERROR_NOACCESS with PublishReadyToRun #65412
    7.0.0

Closed

  • checked corerun annoyances #62760
  • CLA checks are stuck in Pending #65437
  • Is there a way to read certificates from .p12 file and use them for an SSL/TLS communication while using SSLStreams? #65402
  • Loading issue when RID is linux-musl-x64 on Alpine 3.15 #65152
  • [API Proposal]: ConcurrentBag AddRange method #61291
  • [Feature Request] cross-platform data protection #62748
    Future
  • Writing an efficient custom AsyncMethodBuilder is too hard #63125
    Future
  • Error Publishing Blazor WebAssembly app using AOT Compilation #63360
    7.0.0
  • Find a way to get data from embedded resource without reflection #63488
    Future
  • Minimal record definition with camel case deserialization uses Pascal Case #63542
  • System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream looses content, decrypting an encrypted string is now shorter than the original unencrypted string #65440
  • Some Cryptography tests fail on RHEL 9 arm64. #64816
  • Value cannot be null. r nParameter name: content ..IHttpActionResult #65433
  • Assertion failed '!"Write to unaliased local overlaps outstanding read"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' (IL size 7) #65307
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Win32.Registry nuget package still at 5.0.0 #65428
  • Slow file access times when accessing NFS server #48757
    7.0.0
  • FreeBSD: System.Drawing.Printing tests are failing #23786
    Future
  • FreeBSD tests fail to build on Windows 10. Suspect is System.Private.mscorlib.dll #9487
    Future
  • Impact of changing MaxDegreeOfParallelism while running Parallel methods #65410
  • [mono] gshared calls to non-generic static virtual interface method throw BadImageFormatException: Method has no body #65384
    7.0.0
  • GCGenerationRange events missing from Generation Aware Analysis on Linux #64390
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Cache aotdata file in AOTCompiler task #65472
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [IGNORE] [wasm] testing the 3.11 bump #65471
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • FIX | Adds support for Shim gss api on Linux to delay loading libgssapi_krb… #65469
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: better addressing mode for floating point on arm64 #65468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Fix --break #65467
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Avoid additional AssemblyInfo output file #65465
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Always dispose inner stream in StreamPipeWriter.Complete* #65462
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Add FlagsAttribute to GC_ALLOC_FLAGS #65461
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • PGO: Profile isinst/castclass #65460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Compute the type of generic context used by static virtua… #65459
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Forward DefaultDllImportSearchPathsAttribute to the inner P/Invoke. #65458
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Disable component governance for musl runs #65454
  • Remove or move some expensive low-value testing #65453
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add partial to the enclosing types when running the ConvertToGeneratedDllImport fixer #65452
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Trigger all wasm jobs, if `eng/Version.Details.xml` has any chan… #65451
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Perform type/layout verification on some mono-config elements to avoid silent failures or crashes later #65449
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Class types with layout that inherit from System.Object should be ManagedSequential #65447
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [MonoAPI] Split type and function headers, add MONO_API_FUNCTION macro #65446
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono] Fix OP_FMAX an OP_FMIN on amd64 and lift the overly restricted architecture limitation #65445
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add "[createdump]" prefix to all createdump output and logging for VS4Mac #65444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Enable Mariner 2.0 DEPS package #65442
    area-Infrastructure-installer, 7.0.0
  • Added Not, Sqrt, Negate vector intrinsics #65438
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove OpenSSL error queue checking in SslInitializer #65435
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Clear GC info when consuming GT_PUTARG_SPLIT nodes #65432
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize the Regex source generator's handling of `Compilation` objects. #65431
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Move MacCatalyst arm64 leg definitions from runtime-staging to runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #65427
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix verification of open delegates #65425
    area-ILVerification
  • Fix PerformanceCounter's when running with Globalization Invariant Mode #65414
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter
  • [wasm] Disable aot tests failing due to OOM #65413
    arch-wasm, wasm-aot-test

Merged

  • [MAUI][PERF] Reenable Maui w/o package injection #65409
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] add gc directory for LoongArch64. #63071
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Merge a couple NativeAOT smoke tests #65426
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] add the `coreclr/unwinder/loongarch64` from the #62979. #63489
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Proposed changes to ECMA 335 for ref field support #63659
    area-System.Runtime
  • Gracefully emit a diagnostic when the GeneratedDllImport attribute didn't parse quite right and we don't have a valid AttributeData object #65344
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add linux-musl entry for FALLBACK_HOST_RID #65339
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Separate capturing from normal states in NonBacktracking #65340
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Explicitly check for TTL expiration when using Ping utility #65312
    area-System.Net
  • Hosting: ConfigDoesReload tests: increase timeout. #64976
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • JIT: Consider local var reads to be outstanding only if they are values #65309
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Suppress warnings in NativeAOT smoke tests #65423
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable core dumps when running libraries tests on macOS #65405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update the ConvertToGeneratedDllImport code-fix to support stripping out PreserveSig and transforming the signature when PreserveSig was set to true #65169
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [mini] fix static virtual constrained calls in non-generic interfaces #65390
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Make sure we have GCGenerationRanges events when using Generation-Aware analysis on Linux #65338
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • Generate 300 band Mono.Toolchain manifest #65308
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Optional param fix 56251 #64970
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Send CA names on Linux and OSX #65195
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix Vector256.IsHardwareAccelerated in R2R binaries #65351
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm] Rationalize wasm jobs run on CI #65035
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] HTTP tests on NodeJS #65303
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Use `--emit-symbol-map` to generate a `dotnet.js.symbols` #65162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Expand indirection cell calls in IR instead of doing ad-hoc optimizations in codegen #65388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch/filter clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add support for Windows IO completions to the portable thread pool #64834
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Fix minor random bias #65404
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Fix Type.IsPublic for pointer and byref types #65156
    area-System.Reflection
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement StringWriter composite formatting overloads. #65241
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • NetworkAddressChange.Unix: use async Socket API to wait for events. #64614
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [JIT] More ARM64 comparison instruction optimizations with Vector.Zero #64783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use `push` for 8/12 byte struct args on x86 #65387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI] Add startup time and size mesauresments for dotnet-podcast app #65398
  • [WIP] Heuristic change for double constant adjustment #65176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Unroll Equals and StartsWith for constant strings and spans. [0..32] chars #65288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add RIDs for MIRACLE LINUX 8 and 9 #61304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type #65237
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating wasm stack traces via XHarness #65167
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [DRAFT] Add MonoApi runtime tests #65221
    * NO MERGE *
  • Remove ExactSpelling from GeneratedDllImport #65343
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Use C# 10's enhanced struct initialization features #63131
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Run debugger test in codespace #64746
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add a transport package with libmono-profiler-aot.so on Android #65401
    area-Build-mono
  • Improve ImmutableArray.RemoveRange #65186
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Changes to reduce committed memory: #65367
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add checks for interpreter stack overflow. #65315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [EventPipe] Fix reverse connection socket leaking to child processes. #65365
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • FileSystemWatcher.Linux: handle races while adding child directories. #64906
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix exceptions on eval #64374
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Process.Unix: reap all processes when running as pid 1. #65061
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Fix remaining COM warnings in crossgen2 #65297
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • fix few Filesystem tests on FreeBSD #65059
    area-System.IO, os-freebsd, test enhancement
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Deduplicate some HWI codegen code #65302
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Remove condition that forbids promotion of HFAs with CUSTOMLAYOUT flag #64863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SSA def descriptors in copy propagation #65250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Draft for x ^ 0 opt (#65071) #65072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Do not number partial definitions and `ARGPLACE` nodes #64898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Handle direct addresses for statics in `IsFieldAddr` #64846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Move IsKnownConstant handling to ExtendedDefaultPolicy #64809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix missing zero-offset sequences and add checking #64805
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • update SSL tests to deal better with disabled protocols #65120
    area-System.Net.Security, test enhancement
